speech.name: rejection
lines: Fine then. I don't need you. I DON'T NEED ANY OF YOU.

speech.name: field
lines: ::rolls up sleeves:: Lemme at 'em. I bet I can take all of them DOWN.
Sometimes I wonder if I'd look good with a unicorn horn on my head. Do you think I'd look good with a unicorn horn on my head?
You know what, I think I would look good with a unicorn horn on my head. Thank you.

speech.name: perkinite_NM
lines: Nate, I f**kin' swear if you steal my reading glasses again I will literally SHANK you.

speech.name: npc
lines: I really need some coffee right about now.
Eh, how's about we grab a beer and chat about life?
Don't worry, girls still shit out rainbows and unicorns.
Bro, do you know if I have a dick or not?
Duuuuude, that was kinda messed up.
